background.name: Custom Background

entries.name: Choose Abilties
entries: Choose three abilities that seem appropriate for the background:

items.name: Strength or Dexterity
items.entry: These abilities are ideal for a background involving physical exertion.

items.name: Constitution
items.entry: This ability is ideal for a background that involves endurance or long hours of activity.

items.name: Intelligence or Wisdom
items.entry: One or both abilities are ideal for a background that focuses on cerebral or spiritual matters.

items.name: Charisma
items.entry: This ability is ideal for a background that involves performance or social interaction.

entries.name: Choose a Feat
entries: Choose one feat from the {@filter Origin|feats|category=O} category. See the {@book Player's Handbook|XPHB} for examples of {@book Origin feats|XPHB|5|Origin Feats}.

entries.name: Choose Skill Proficiencies
entries: Choose two skills appropriate for the background. There needn't be a relationship between the skill proficiencies a background grants and the ability scores it increases.

entries.name: Choose a Tool Proficiency
entries: Choose one tool used in the practice of the background or often associated with it.

entries.name: Choose Equipment
entries: Assemble a package of equipment worth 50 GP (including unspent gold). Don't include Martial weapons or armor, as characters get them from their class choices.
{@note See the section on {@book Creating a Background|XDMG|2|Creating a Background} in the {@book Dungon Master's Guide|XDMG} for more information.}
